description.2: My roles: Director, Cinematographer, Co-Writer, Producer, Editor
description.3: The Great Chicken Heist is a short movie about 3 guys who find out that chicken prices are through the roof. They decide to steal a chicken from a chicken competition to have a nice chicken dinner.
